answer: Rosé wine from California. Unoaked. Low alcohol. Medium levels of sweetness. Flavors of red fruits (strawberry & raspberry)

answer: Not Pinot Noir but has simular chacteristics. Red, dry, light bodied, from France, low tannins, flavors of red fruits (raspberry & red cherry)

question: Describe a Côte du Rhône wine

question: Describe a Chianti wine

question: Describe a Rioja wine

question: Describe a Sauternes wine
